description.rawText: Budding statistician? Join our mission. Civil Service Resourcing (CSR) is helping shape the future of the civil service by ensuring we identify the best people - internally or externally and regardless of background - to do some of the most important jobs in our society. Already a highly regarded expert service,  we offer professional recruitment and assessment services - helping civil service clients build the high calibre teams that drive positive change in the way Government operates.  Your input will provide the information we need to define CSR's strategic direction,  underpin our development,  improve civil service diversity,  and create excellence in our service offer. About the roleWe are now seeking a high potential statistician to help shape and drive the data capability underpinning our ambition to be the best resourcing service across the UK within three years.  You will be central to shaping analytic work in a new Research &Analysis unit,  helping to deliver high profile analytic,  data-driven reporting products to the strategic centre of the Civil Service.  Supporting our high profile work with a range of data collection,  data analytical and data management duties,  you will help improve our business and to deliver value for our customers and for the citizen. Reporting to the Grade 7 Head of Research and Analysis you will have a high degree of autonomy and responsibility to work with colleagues from across the Directorate to develop and deliver data collections,  embed best practice in data management and deliver high quality analytical outputs for policy colleagues and senior stakeholders.  This is a valuable opportunity to join a young and growing Directorate and to help in actively building and shaping a key component of the organisation's capability. About youThis role is highly suited to someone with a background in analytics,  MI,  data collection,  or from an analytical profession such as statistics or research.  A self starter,  you will be proactive in your approach to shaping our developing business areas,  proposing solutions to help ensure insight driven growth. The ideal candidate will have the skills and experience to deliver data-analytic outputs and to advise on and implement practical solutions in terms of data collection,  storage,  and utilisation across diverse teams and service lines,  working proactively and with minimum supervision. You'll have a proven ability to juggle competing priorities while working methodically with complex information,  and will take pride in accuracy and reliability of products.  You will have a good understanding of the use of analysis,  evidence and statistics and will be able to communicate using appropriate styles to maximise understanding and impact.  You will have experience of using specialist software (eg Stata,  SPSS,  R,  Excel) and a track record of establishing collaborative relationships with a range of colleagues,  internal and external,  to deliver on business needs. QualificationsIf you are a member of the Government Statistical Service you are eligible to apply.  Please state this membership in your application. If you aren't a member of GSS,  you should have a 2:2 degree in a numerate discipline such as mathematics,  economics,  psychology,  geography (applications are welcome from those whose degree contain formal statistical training),  or have appropriate experience in a relevant analytical field. Find out more and apply - click the APPLY button.

companyDescription.rawText: Totaljobsportal. com is a brand new career website for job market in India specifically caters to the need of aspiring jobseekers.  We believe that a good job site should offer an interactive platform for job seekers with the objective of improving the process of recruitment. Our MissionAt Totaljobsportal. com,  we work for a main purpose: “Satisfaction for Job seekers” This is our mission.  We believe that satisfaction for job is one of the most crucial factors for overall happiness of an aspiring jobseeker. This is why the work we do at Totaljobsportal. com is so meaningful.  We excel in matching right people with right jobs. Our TeamTotaljobsportal. com is managed by a team of highly skilled and experienced HR personnel.  Our team members work with their best to find right jobs for job seekers.  Following are our respected team members:-HR and RecruitmentMr.  Rajkumar Iyer(Director and Senior HR officer)(13+ years of experience)Neha Agrawal(HR operation Mnager)Sangeeta Sachdeva(Assistant HR)Abhilash Saxena(Assistant HR)
